name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is a shiny black oscilloscope-themed robot with a retro console button interface. It has soldier-like arms and legs, giving it a sturdy and strong appearance. The screen of Retrotron displays a classic snake game, reminiscent of vintage gaming. As an additional feature, it is equipped with a helmet for added protection and style. Retrotron is a proud member of the WebtrES club.
